des: "This is the best recipe for creamy and delicious peanut butter fudge I have ever used.  It is great for sharing at work."
ins: Melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat.  Stir in brown sugar and milk.  Bring to a boil and boil for 2 minutes, stirring frequently.  Remove from heat.  Stir in peanut butter and vanilla.  Pour over confectioners' sugar in a large mixing bowl.  Beat until smooth; pour into an 8x8 inch dish.  Chill until firm and cut into squares.
